subject: test(query): add integration tests against demo dataset
body:
Exercise the query engine (executeQuery + executePipeline) against the
full demoData fixture (~40 nodes, ~44 arcs) to catch issues that small
handcrafted fixtures miss. Covers label/property/title filters, boolean
logic (AND/OR/NOT), parenthetical grouping, comparison operators,
relationship predicates (IN/OUT/CONN), compound queries, and multi-step
pipelines.

Surfaced a known limitation: text parser cannot query labels containing
spaces (e.g. "competes with") â€” documented in test comments.

Tags: query, testing, integration, demo-data
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 1
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: interactive-query-builder
Semver: patch

title: add integration tests against demo dataset
